programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Paddington Finds a Hobby / Paddington and the Stamp - Paddington does not have a hobby like all of the Browns, but Mrs. Brown finds out what Paddington is good at. // Paddington gets his arm stuck in a post box after accidentally using Mr. Gruber's rare Penny Black stamp on his letter to Aunt Lucy.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep318
programme.desc: Rongisõit - Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her friends on a train ride, where they must tick off what they see on their activity sheets. Meanwhile Pedro keeps losing his ticket.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep320
programme.desc: Talent Day - It is Talent Day at Peppa's daycare. Madame Gazelle wants everyone to show the class their special talent.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep321
programme.desc: Trip to the Moon - Peppa's family go to the museum's moon exhibition with George's friend Edmond Elephant. But Peppa thinks there are going to the real moon and is worried.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Shooting Star - Anna and her friends want to watch Shooting Stars - but Froga is scared of the dark! With a little encouragement (and a visit to her Night Tomato) Froga conquers her fears and has a wonderful and memorable night with her friends.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Circus Celebration - Bubu's DVD of his favorite circus show does not work. The others create their own circus acts in the backyard. Doing acrobatics, juggling, and magic! Bubu joins them, even when the DVD player is fixed, they prefer to stay in the backyard to play!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Happy Birthday Blue - It's Blue's birthday! We're playing Blue's Clues to figure out what present Blue wants for her birthday. While we look for Clues, we help Josh get ready for the party by observing patterns & take a trip to Joe's Present Store.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep804
programme.desc: Pups Stop the Cheetah - When the Cheetah swipes the Paw Patroller to fulfill her nefarious plan to destroy the jungle and build the cheating-est racetrack ever, the Paw Patrol must get a brand vehicle and stop her!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep825
programme.desc: Rubble and Wild and a Yarn Ball! / Skye and Rory Flip It - Rubble and Wild rescue animals from a giant runaway ball of yarn. // Skye and Rory rescue a painter hanging from a scaffold.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Kai Express / Ducknado - When Kai joins all the deer's carts together, the vehicles end up as a runaway train in the Central Forest! // Sir Steel's super powerful hairdryer creates a giant tornado that sucks up Ian, his ducklings and a heap of other things.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Tiny Heroes/Big Face in Space - When the younger animals in the forest want to be like their heroes Deer Squad, things don't go as planned as Sir Steel steps in. // The Deer Squad have to save the day in Space when Sir Steel's plan to project his face on the moon goes wrong!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Paddington and the Wardrobe / Paddington Helps with Homework - Paddington is accidentally delivered inside a wardrobe to Mr. Curry's house and must get out before he is discovered. // Paddington tries to help Judy with her geography homework and ends up being the subject of it.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Paddington's not Himself - Paddington has a fall and loses his climbing confidence - without climbing he doesn't feel like himself at all - what can he do?

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches - The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another. // Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Let Justice Be done / The Great Spring Clean - Barbabeau forgot to return his book to the library. As Mr Strict the librarian is visiting Barbapapa today, Barbabeau decides to run away. // Barbamama wants the barbababies to tidy their bedrooms. They're hiding to escape the drudgery.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep106
programme.desc: When You Wish Upon a Fish / Shark-Off - Baby and friends set out to climb Wish Mountain and make a wish on the legendary shooting starfish, Ol' Sea Breeze. // Shadow challenges Baby Shark to a Shark-Off to prove who's the sharkiest shark.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Teensy the Tardigrade - Baby Shark adopts a teensy tiny pet, but is he ready for a big responsibility?

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Friendship Journal - Anna decides to make a scrapbook to celebrate Friendship, where each try to come up with something special enough to deserve the first page in her "friendship journal."

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Hide and Seek - Anna and her friends are outside playing Ron's favorite game, Hide-and-Seek! Anna is the Seeker and quickly finds Froga, Christopher and Bubu. When the friends work together to try to find Ron, they realize he's found the best hiding spot of all.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep171
programme.desc: Bubu's New Blue Jeans - Christopher has prepared his annual obstacle race and is excited for all the friends to participate. Bubu's new blue jeans are still drying so he has to wear his brand-new pair to the event, he becomes overly concerned of getting them dirty.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep174
programme.desc: Achoo ! - Bubu teaches Christopher about allergies. And when he witnesses Anna sneezing uncontrollably when she is around Froga, he is convinced that she is allergic to her! They wonder if they will ever be able to live life as they once did!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep177
programme.desc: The Funny Photo - While flipping through her Funny Photo Album, Froga is surprised to learn she has no funny picture of Anna! Setting off to remedy this, Froga instills the assistance of her friends to try to score a hilarious photo of Anna.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Strawberries - Anna and Froga are excited to make the best strawberry pie ever with the first strawberries of the season. Anna makes a plan to distract Christopher while they make the pie!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep322
programme.desc: Grandpa at the Playground - Grandpa Pig takes Peppa and George to the playground, but does not understand the children's rules.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep323
programme.desc: Goldie the Fish - Goldie the fish does not look happy and is not eating her food, so Peppa, George and Mummy Pig take her on a bus trip to visit Dr Hamster the vet.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep324
programme.desc: Fun Fair - The family go to the funfair, but Mummy Pig is angry when people at the fair tell her that she will not be able to win prizes in the competitions, just like George is sad because the mini golf course is too big for him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep325
programme.desc: Numbers - Peppa and her friends learn how to count by playing games at Madame Gazelle's daycare.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep507
programme.desc: Shadows - Peppa and George realize that they have shadows and no matter what they do, they can't escape from them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep508
programme.desc: International Day - Peppa and her friends at playgroup dress up in clothes from different countries all over the world, but then have an argument.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep509
programme.desc: The Rainy Day Game - Daddy teaches Peppa and George a fun game to play while they wait inside for the rain to stop.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep106
programme.desc: It's Only a Mystery... - Taking after his favourite detective, Barbabravo looks for a case to solve. Can he solve the mystery of the missing ice statue?

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep113
programme.desc: The Perfect Dinner / The Kittens - Barbapapa and Barbamama go out to celebrate their birthdays. Barbabelle is in charge and gets overwhelmed. // Barbabelle watches Bali's kittens. She's scared something will happen and won't let them out. Barbamama must intervene to help the kittens.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Axle City Grand Prix - Gabby has the perfect tool to get Blaze ready to race: a special remote that can control any machine. But when Crusher takes her remote, he activates machines all over town to slow Blaze down.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep624
programme.desc: Superwheels! - Blaze super powers transforming him into... SUPER BLAZE!! And just in time; trouble Bots from outer space land in Axle City and start making a huge mess!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep912
programme.desc: Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch / Pups Save a Lonely Ghost - When Eddie and Emmy get impatient at the carnival, they hide in Mayor Humdinger's Humsquatch costume to chase everyone out. // Rubble dreams that he meets a ghost and learns that it's not easy to help a ghost make new friends.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep221
programme.desc: Pups Save Walinda / Pups Save a Big Bone - The PAW Patrol plan a special celebration for Wally the Walrus. When he doesn't show up, they find he has a special new friend named Walinda! // During Cap’n Turbot's archaeological dig, a rock slide unearths a big dinosaur bone!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Were wig on the the loose / Lights Camera Action - When Sir Steel's high-tech wig malfunctions and goes on the rampage in Platinum City the Deer Squad race to the rescue. // The Deer Squad must think fast to save Lady Fluffpot when Sir Steel's filming turns into a Disaster Movie!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Jump up & get down - It's Deer Squad to the rescue when Stu and Safia bounce off to space on their super bouncy mega trampolines.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Panddington and the Treehouse / Paddington and the Monster Hunt - Mr. Brown is worried he won't get sleep since the kids will be scared camping in the treehouse. Paddington wants to prove him wrong but there is a lightning storm. // There's a monster in Paddington's room and Mrs. Bird takes him on a monster hunt.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Paddington and the Painting / Paddington Finds Buried Treasure - Mrs. Brown can't find inspiration for her next art work so Paddington decides to help find her mojo! // Jonathan and Paddington dig up some broken pottery that turns out to be a statue made by Mrs. Brown. But who broke it?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep326
programme.desc: Digging Up the Road - Peppa and her family are trying to get to the playground, but Mr Bull's roadworks are in the way.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep401
programme.desc: Freddy Fox - Peppa and her friends are playing hide and seek, but it is Freddy Fox with his super smelling nose who is the best at playing that game.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep402
programme.desc: Whistling - Peppa tries to learn how to whistle after she realizes that seemingly everyone but her can do it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep403
programme.desc: Doctor Hamster's Tortoise - Doctor Hamster the vet comes to Peppa's playgroup to show the children her pets. But Tiddles has run away. But Ms. Rabbit is going to rescue Tiddles.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep624
programme.desc: See You Later Alligator! - Bayou Chicken Farmers Deema and Goby discover an unusual egg on their farm one morning, and set off on a bayou river adventure to find the egg's mama. Can they return the egg before it hatches...and before a big bayou gator catches them?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Welcome to Blue's Bistro - Welcome to Blue's Bistro - a very fancy restaurant! While playing Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to eat, we help Josh take our friends' orders and skidoo to Farmer Goat's farm to retrieve fresh vegetables!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Sleepy Singalong with Blue - It's a nighttime game of Blue's Clues to figure out Blue's favorite part of bedtime! As we search for clues, we help Blue and Polka Dots get clean, comfy, cozy and ready for bed.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep210
programme.desc: The Time Capsule / Hiccup Soup - Santi and crew get magically transported to the past, where they team up with young Abuelo to get back to the present! // When faced with a case of magical hiccups, Santi and his crew must collect ingredients to make the cure-all Hiccup Soup.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep118
programme.desc: The Curse of the Pirate Baby - Bonnie Bones transforms into a baby and it's up to the good pirates to change her back.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep104
programme.desc: William vs. Wild - After making up a lie to sound brave, William is forced to face his fears and travel into the super scary Kelp Woods.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Baby Tooth - When Baby Shark loses his tooth for real, he and William team up with an unexpected ally to track it down.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep404
programme.desc: Sun, Sea and Snow - Peppa and her friends and family are looking forward to a trip to the beach where they can make sandcastles, but when they arrive at the beach there is too much snow!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep405
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig's Computer - Mummy Pig gives her old PC to Granny and Grandpa Pig. Will they be able to use it?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep406
programme.desc: Hospital - Peppa and her playgroup friends go with Madame Gazelle to visit Pedro Pony, who is in hospital with a broken leg.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep117
programme.desc: A Very Busy Afternoon - Froga organises a gathering to share jam sandwiches with everyone, Ron and Christopher want to show off their acrobatic frisbee skills, Bubu invents a new game he wants to teach his friends - all at the same time!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep118
programme.desc: The Four-Leaf Clover - Anna and her friends have organized a hula hoop competition and Froga relies on her four-leaf clover to help her win! But when she loses it, Froga is convinced there is no way she'll ever win.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Barbabravo Is Not Feeling Well / Be Patient Barbabravo... - Following a misadventure, Barbabravo is unable to transform at all. The whole family unites to help him. // Barbabravo can't stay put and is unable to focus one an activity for very long. Barbalala offers to teach him control. Will she succeed?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep106
programme.desc: 123's with Blue - Count along with Josh & Blue in this game of Blue's Clues to find out what Blue wants to buy at the store. We help Shovel & Pail learn who has more graham crackers then help Josh discover what he can buy with his Blue dollars.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep912
programme.desc: Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch / Pups Save a Lonely Ghost - When Eddie and Emmy get impatient at the carnival, they hide in Mayor Humdinger's Humsquatch costume to chase everyone out. // Rubble dreams that he meets a ghost and learns that it's not easy to help a ghost make new friends.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Donut Panic / I Scream - Rammy's tips on focus and meditation come in handy when Sir Steel's Replicator causes havoc in the Central Forest with giant donuts. // When Kai overexerts his Water Power on an ice cream machine, the machine turns into a rampaging Ice-Bot!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Treasure Park/Baddy Long Legs - When Bobbi and Jade find an underground cavern, they end up in danger when Sir Steel goes treasure hunting! // Rammy is so focused on meditation that he fails to focus on a REAL crisis!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Paddington and the Lost Gerbil / Paddington Earns a Ranger Badge - Paddington accidentally releases the school pet Gerbil that Judy is looking after. Paddington and Judy search for it in the house and in Mr. Curry's garden. // Jonathan and Paddington must get their Ranger badges but Mr. Curry is not happy with them.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep220
programme.desc: Paddington's Taste of Italy - Mr. Gruber has always wanted to go to Italy & Paddington sets about helping his friend achieve his dream!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Double Dare You / Roy - On a ski trip, the Barbapapas build a giant igloo. Barbabravo and Barbalib challenge each other to find out who is braver. // Barbabright creates a vacuuming robot that's also very good at soccer. The Barbababies organise a match against the robots.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep111
programme.desc: The Grass is Always Greener... / When I Grow Up - Barbabright coats the house in magic product to prevent water leakage. The next day, The house deflates like a balloon. // A bird builds its nest on Barbazoo's belly. Barbazoo wants to become a big tree to shelter animals. This becomes complicated.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Show Must Flow On / Detective Baby Shark - When Goldie's feeling down, Baby and friends decide to put on a musical to help her shine. // When Grandma's shortcake goes missing before the bake-off, it's a case for Detective Baby Shark and William Watson!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Shadowland - Jealous of Baby Shark's popularity, Shadow rebrands the Wreck as his own personal amusement park.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Bubble Trouble - Bubu's bubble maker invention works so well, it creates an enormous bubble that Christopher gets trapped in! He loves his journey soaring over the land - but his friends are desperate to rescue him!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Party Time - Anna and Froga want to throw a party..... since it is not a particular party day they decide to celebrate "Tomato Day", But Christopher ate all of the tomatoes ... so they need to find another name... Anna finds the perfect name: Friendship party!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Swing - When Anna and Froga discover the old seat of their swing, they are excited to hang it on the apple tree. But the ropes to attach it have gone missing!The two friends' search for the missing ropes turns out to be more difficult than they had imagined!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep103
programme.desc: The Detectives - Froga is desperate. Her favourite toy Super Pebble has disappeared! Now Anna and Ron work with Froga play detectives. Thanks to a thoughtful gift from Christopher, Froga ends up finding her missing Super stone herself!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Super Christopher - Christopher visits Anna with his " Super Christopher" costume, ready for adventure! But being a superhero comes with a whole set of challenges. Christopher isn't just a superhero. He's also a super friend.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep105
programme.desc: The Photo - Polaroid camera, she decides to take pictures of all her friends. Everyone thinks it's a great idea and Anna makes some great portraits. But things get complicated when she tries to take a group shot of everyone!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep410
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Lighthouse - Granddad Dog takes Peppa, George and Danny Dog to visit Grampy Rabbit's lighthouse.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep411
programme.desc: Miss Rabbit's Day Off - Miss Rabbit has hurt her ankle, so her sister and her friends offer to fill in for her at the ice cream stand, the supermarket – and everywhere else she works!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep414
programme.desc: The Secret Club - Suzy and Peppa start a Secret Agent Club – going on secret missions, and doing secret things. In secret. But soon everyone wants to join!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep415
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard - Grandpa Pig needs help when his boat sinks, so Granddad Dog gives them all a lift to Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard so that the boat can be fixed.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep510
programme.desc: Mummy Rabbit's Bump - Everyone is excited when Mummy Rabbit arrives with some big news-she is pregnant! Will it be one baby or twins?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep511
programme.desc: Pedro the Cowboy - Pedro Pony pretends he is a proper cowboy, telling everyone stories in the camp he has set up in the garden.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep512
programme.desc: Peppa and George's Garden - Grandpa Pig pops round with some seeds for Peppa and George. Daddy Pig helps out by being a scarecrow

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep106
programme.desc: The Battle - Inspired by their favourite heroes, the Barbababies make costumes. But no heroes are possible without villains...

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep114
programme.desc: The Treasure Hunt / Going into the Wild - Mr. Strict's twins visit the barbababies. The barbababies organize a treasure hunt for the twins and enjoy the great outdoors. // The Barbapapas are off to a new adventure... in the garden. But living in nature is more complicated than they expected.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Dinosaur Parade - Blaze, AJ, and lots of spectators have gathered to watch herds of dinosaurs march through Axle City! But Crusher pushes his way into the parade, scattering dinos everywhere. It's up to Blaze, AJ, and Zeg to find and rescue them!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S01 Ep103
programme.desc: The Driving Force - When Starla the friendly cowgirl truck loses one of her pistons, Blaze and AJ set out to get it back. But they’ll have to hurry before Crusher gets his greedy tires on it!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep222
programme.desc: Pups Save a Floundering Francois / Pups Save the Pop-Up Penguins - Cap’n Turbot and his cousin Francois are whale watching when the Flounder hits a rock and starts to sink! This rescue needs all paws on deck. // Stowaway penguins have scattered around Adventure Bay! Time to call the PAW Patrol!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep915
programme.desc: Pups Save a T-Rex Tyke / Pups Save a Playful Elephant Calf - When a baby T-Rex gets lost, Ryder and the pups go on a daring mission to the Dino Wilds to help find him. // When Everest joins the Paw Patrol for a visit to the jungle, she makes friends with a clumsy elephant calf and then must help rescue him.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Raining teddies / Party people - Jade's first sleepover is an eventful occasion when Stu & Safia make it rain teddies across the city and Central Forest! // Sir Steel is put out when he discovers he's not been invited to Lady Fluffpot's party but the Deer Squad are.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Good Steel bad Steel - What's worse than Sir Steel? Two Sir Steels! Can the Deer Squad spot the real one with Muffin's help?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Paddington Plans a Party / Paddington Learns the Violin - Mr Brown has forgotten to get Mrs Brown a Birthday present, Paddington decides to hold a surprise party. // Judy does not like Violin lessons so hides from Ms Potts. Paddington takes up the challenge. Watch out ears!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Paddington Makes a Scrapbook / Paddington Digs a Tunnel to Peru - Paddington decides to make a scrapbook of memories and tries to include all his friends to show Aunt Lucy. // Paddington decides to dig a Tunnel through the centre of the earth to Peru but ends up in Mr. Curry's green house.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep416
programme.desc: Shake, Rattle and Bang - Madame Gazelle gives the class a music lesson. There's lots of crashing and banging at first, but it's not long before the grown-ups visit and lay down some notes of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep417
programme.desc: Champion Daddy Pig - Daddy Pig loses his title as Champion Puddle Jumper during the Daddi-Olympics, so everyone helps him train to win it back at the Daddi-Olympics.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep418
programme.desc: Chatterbox - Peppa Pig talks far too much. Or at least so Suzy thinks. In response, Peppa decides that she is never going to talk, ever again. But this does not last for very long at all.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep419
programme.desc: Mr Fox's Van - When Daddy Pig needs a new watch, Mr Fox finds three grandfather clocks in the back of his van. Three clocks are much better than one. Mr Fox has everything in his van – even a chicken!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep625
programme.desc: The Ultra Spy Tool! - When supervillain Dr. Coldfinger takes Curly Q's newest invention, the Ultra Spy Tool, Secret Agents Molly, Goby and Spy Pup must travel across the world to find and infiltrate his North Pole lair with regular tools to save the day!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Blue's Rainy Day Rainbow - We're playing Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to play on this rainy day! We help Josh get dressed in his rainy-day clothes and skidoo to learn how rainbows are formed. We even meet a real rainbow!

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep119
programme.desc: Hidey Hup - Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po drive to the Hidey Hup in the Tubby Car. They enjoy going on the Tubby Bouncy, the Tubby Uppy Downy, the Tubby Spinny and the Tubby Slidey.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S3) Ep4
programme.desc: Teddy - Dee encourages a friend to say 'teddy' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see a rainbow teddy, a flying teddy, a fluffy teddy and even a flower teddy!

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep61
programme.desc: Training Wheels - Tinpo helps Logi-Po to feel part of the team when he can't pull Uni-Board tricks like Doug-Po.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) Ep36
programme.desc: It's time to build a snowman! - It's a snowy day and JoJo and Gran Gran go to the park to build a snow panda!

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep17
programme.desc: Daredevil Dude - Monty ponders whether all heroes have to solve big problems or if there are some superheroes who focus on smaller tasks.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep16
programme.desc: The Night's Alright - Even though it is bedtime, Monty and Jimmy Jones aren't tired and Monty wonders if the night is really just for sleeping.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) Ep6
programme.desc: Stumpfest - Dad and his mates hit the backyard, ready to rip up some tree stumps! But when Bluey and Bingo take over a stump as a nail salon, Dad finds he's got some negotiating to do.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep2
programme.desc: The Whistling Badge - When Egg, the cheeky little chick, goes on the run again, Duggee whistles to get him back. Hang on a minute Duggee, what was that noise? A whistle? The squirrels want to learn how to whistle.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep1
programme.desc: The Making Music Badge - When the squirrels find Duggee playing saxophone, they want to have a go too. Several pots, balloons, tins, water and tubes later and the squirrels are making music. And boy, are they loud!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep52
programme.desc: The Story Badge - The squirrels do everything at the clubhouse, from reading and drawing, to running and dancing, and tire themselves out, so Duggee suggests they have a break with a story.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep23
programme.desc: Giant's Causeway, Northern Ireland - A Giant Grandmaster Glitch means BIG trouble for the Giant's Causeway!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep22
programme.desc: The Wieliczka Salt Mine, Poland - The Go Jetters must save the famous salt statues in the Wieliczka Salt mine

programme.title: Bluey (S2) Ep5
programme.desc: Hairdressers - During a game of hairdressers, Bluey discovers that big-headed customer Dad has nits! To help treat them Bingo has to find her voice, while Bluey has to find her ears.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) Ep4
programme.desc: Squash - When dad and Uncle Stripe play a game of squash, Bluey and Bingo are in control of their every move, and Bingo proves that big siblings don't always beat little siblings.

programme.title: Andy's Prehistoric Adventures (S1) Ep14
programme.desc: Gigantoraptor & Feather - Andy travels back 85 million years to meet a giant feathered dinosaur. Along the way he helps protect a nest full of prehistoric eggs and gets caught in a super-sized sandstorm.

programme.title: Ranger Hamza's Eco Quest (S1) Ep9
programme.desc: Hedges - Ranger Hamza and the Ramblers discover how hedges play an important role in the environment.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S6) Ep1
programme.desc: Meet Captain HeyHo - Gem, Cook and Line are once again shipwrecked but this time on an island where a brand new pirate captain lives. She quickly announces herself as Captain HeyHo, the new Captain of the Scarlett Squid.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep51
programme.desc: The Teddy Bear Badge - The dog and the squirrels take their teddy bears out for a picnic. However, they soon spot a huge teddy and discover it's Beryl.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep50
programme.desc: The Surprise Badge - The squirrels and Duggee buy Hennie a surprise present for her birthday - but first they need to wrap it up.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) Ep49
programme.desc: The Sewing Badge - Duggee is sewing and makes a snazzy poncho, inspiring the squirrels to make one too. When they hear a very loud sneeze, the group investigates and finds a polar bear with a cold.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep21
programme.desc: The Forbidden City, China - Some runaway Chinese drums roll towards The Forbidden City. Can the Go Jetters stop them?

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep20
programme.desc: The Dead Sea, Middle East - The Go Jetters are relaxing by the Dead Sea when Grandmaster Glitch causes a catastrophe.

programme.desc: Whiff's Wish - Whiff brings some empty rubbish trucks to the docks and pulls up next to Spencer, who has brought the Mayor to meet a friend. The Mayor compliments Spencer, which makes Whiff very impressed.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) Ep14

programme.title: UFC 285: Jones vs. Gane
programme.desc: Prelims - The undisputed UFC heavyweight championship will be on the line on March 5 when former 205-pound champion Jon Jones makes the move north to face France’s Ciryl Gane in the main event of UFC 285 at T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas. A top contender who has won 11 of his 12 pro bouts, defeating the likes of Derrick Lewis, Junior Dos Santos and Tai Tuivasa while also wearing the interim heavyweight title belt, Gane now has the vacant undisputed crown in his sights, but to get it, he has to hold off the charge of UFC superstar Jones, whose storied career in the light heavyweight division now gets a second chapter among the heavyweights, where “Bones” will attempt to make history by becoming a two-division champion. Plus, Valentina Shevchenko will look to continue her dominant reign atop the flyweight division when she faces surging Mexican contender Alexa Grasso for the 125-pound crown.

programme.title: UFC 285: Jones vs. Gane
programme.desc: Main Event - The undisputed UFC heavyweight championship will be on the line on March 5 when former 205-pound champion Jon Jones makes the move north to face France’s Ciryl Gane in the main event of UFC 285 at T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas. A top contender who has won 11 of his 12 pro bouts, defeating the likes of Derrick Lewis, Junior Dos Santos and Tai Tuivasa while also wearing the interim heavyweight title belt, Gane now has the vacant undisputed crown in his sights, but to get it, he has to hold off the charge of UFC superstar Jones, whose storied career in the light heavyweight division now gets a second chapter among the heavyweights, where “Bones” will attempt to make history by becoming a two-division champion. Plus, Valentina Shevchenko will look to continue her dominant reign atop the flyweight division when she faces surging Mexican contender Alexa Grasso for the 125-pound crown.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep908AdesanyavsWhittaker2
programme.desc: Middleweight champion Israel “The Last Stylebender” Adesanya comes face to face with the man he defeated to earn the 185-pound belt, Robert “The Reaper” Whittaker”. See both athletes train and prepare ahead of their rematch at UFC 271.

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep10
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep6
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep11
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Knockouts
programme.desc: Black History Month “Heavyweights - UFC Ultimate Knockouts celebrates Black History Month with a collection of the most powerful knockouts coming from the heavyweight division. See Francis Ngannou, Derrick Lewis, Curtis Blaydes, Walt Harris, and more.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Dynamite Ep2301
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a two-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: Gran Premio Red Bull de España Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - The Spanish motorcycle Grand Prix is a motorcycling event that is part of the FIM Grand Prix motorcycle racing season that takes place at Circuito de Jerez-Ángel Nieto outside Jerez de la Frontera in Andalucia. In addition to this event, three other World Championship motorcycling events take place in Spain as of the 2019 season: the Catalan motorcycle Grand Prix, the Aragon motorcycle Grand Prix and the Valencian Community motorcycle Grand Prix, in the autonomous communities of Catalonia, Aragon and Valencia respectively. Circuito de Jerez-Ángel Nieto is due to host three Grands Prix in 2022, 2023 and 2025

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2301
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Yan vs. Dvalishvili
programme.desc: Prelims - A relentless force meets an immovable tank on March 11 when former bantamweight champion Petr “No Mercy” Yan faces Merab “The Machine” Dvalishvili in a highly anticipatedUFC Fight Night main event at The Theater at Virgin Hotels in Las Vegas. On the road to regaining his 135-pound crown, Yan’s resume includes knockouts of Urijah Faber and Jose Aldo, and he plans on adding Dvalishvili’s name to that list, but with eight consecutive wins and an aggressive attack that has seen him defeat Aldo, Marlon Moraes and Cody Stamann, “The Machine” is no one’s stepping stone

programme.desc: Undefeated in the UFC and reigning featherweight champion, Alexander Volkanovski defends his title against Jiu-Jitsu savant, Brian “T-City” Ortega at UFC 266. See both men train and prepare to fight for the UFC’s 145-pound title.

programme.desc: UFC 270 featured a heavyweight bout between reigning champion Francis Ngannou and interim champion Cyril Gane. Also, Brandon Moreno and Deivesion Figueiredo threw down for a third time for flyweight gold. See the main card on UFC Reloaded

programme.desc: Highlights - The Spanish motorcycle Grand Prix is a motorcycling event that is part of the FIM Grand Prix motorcycle racing season that takes place at Circuito de Jerez-Ángel Nieto outside Jerez de la Frontera in Andalucia. In addition to this event, three other World Championship motorcycling events take place in Spain as of the 2019 season: the Catalan motorcycle Grand Prix, the Aragon motorcycle Grand Prix and the Valencian Community motorcycle Grand Prix, in the autonomous communities of Catalonia, Aragon and Valencia respectively. Circuito de Jerez-Ángel Nieto is due to host three Grands Prix in 2022, 2023 and 2025

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2301
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: UFC 285: Jones vs. Gane
programme.desc: Prelims - The undisputed UFC heavyweight championship will be on the line on March 5 when former 205-pound champion Jon Jones makes the move north to face France’s Ciryl Gane in the main event of UFC 285 at T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas. A top contender who has won 11 of his 12 pro bouts, defeating the likes of Derrick Lewis, Junior Dos Santos and Tai Tuivasa while also wearing the interim heavyweight title belt, Gane now has the vacant undisputed crown in his sights, but to get it, he has to hold off the charge of UFC superstar Jones, whose storied career in the light heavyweight division now gets a second chapter among the heavyweights, where “Bones” will attempt to make history by becoming a two-division champion. Plus, Valentina Shevchenko will look to continue her dominant reign atop the flyweight division when she faces surging Mexican contender Alexa Grasso for the 125-pound crown.
